articles.title: Government Ministers could owe thousands of euro to State over pension payment issues
articles.description: ‘Serious and systemic’ issues at payroll office will see 13,000 retired civil servants checked
articles.content:
Current Government Ministers could owe thousands of euro to the State due to errors at the national office that handles pension payments.
The sums that will need to be recouped range from hundreds of euro to just above €30,000.
Other Ministers may be... [3560 chars]

articles.title: Delhi weather update: Capital records season's hottest day; heatwave to continue, IMD issues orange alert
articles.description: Delhi weather update: Tuesday's temperature was 3.6 degrees above the average for this time of year. The heat index, or real-feel temperature, soared to an extreme 47.1°C, leaving little room for relief.
articles.content: Delhi weather update: Delhi on Tuesday recorded its highest maximum temperature of the season at 43.8 degrees Celsius. With heatwave conditions gripping the capital, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) has warned that the extreme heat is expect... [1929 chars]

articles.description: The Socceroos need only to avoid a catastrophic defeat against Saudi Arabia in Jeddah to qualify automatically for the  2026 FIFA World Cup. Follow live.

articles.title: ICC junks Duterte request to disqualify 2 judges from deciding jurisdiction issue
articles.description: The plenary of judges of the International Criminal Court has rejected the request of former President Rodrigo Duterte that two ICC judges be disqualified from deciding his challenge to the jurisdiction of the court as regards his case.
articles.content:

articles.content:

Get ready for a rare skywatching moment that won’t return until 2043.

articles.title: NASA Slightly Raises Odds of Asteroid Hitting the Moon in 2032 After Updated JWST Data
articles.description: NASA adjusts the 2032 lunar impact risk of asteroid 2024 YR4 to 4.3% after new data from JWST
articles.content: The likelihood of asteroid 2024 YR4 pummelling into the moon in December 2032 has been increased by new data gathered by the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) by NASA. Feared to be the largest Earth impact threat ever detected, the asteroid's odds of... [2246 chars]
